summary: This is a docket activity notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals indicating that attorney Christian R. Everdell was terminated as counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell. The notice was electronically mailed to court personnel.

persons.name: Christian R. Everdell
persons.context: Attorney whose representation of Ghislaine Maxwell was terminated as indicated in the court docket notice.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the case United States of America v. Maxwell, for whom attorney Christian R. Everdell was terminated.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Stemheim
persons.context: Court personnel to whom the notice was electronically mailed.

connections.description: Christian R. Everdell was serving as an attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell, but this relationship was terminated as per the court notice.

events.title: Termination of Attorney Christian R. Everdell
events.description: Attorney Christian R. Everdell was terminated as counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell in the appellate case United States of America v. Maxwell.

keyFacts: Attorney Christian R. Everdell was terminated as counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell in the appellate case 21-58.
The termination was recorded in the docket of the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit.
The notice was electronically mailed to Deputy Clerk Bobbi C. Stemheim.
